Seer Skahi:
Tarkai gave me your instructions. The Human soul you released can't rest in peace, you must find him again! Here's your test. The Ketra Orcs, a lower race who betrayed us long ago, and the Varka Silenos are at war. They each have a* Divine Stone of Wisdom*, but you must earn their absolute trust to get it. Bring either stone to pass the test. Which side do you choose?
The Ketra Orcs The Varka Silenos
